comments.html:
The next fun part starts when trying to run BFD on the MLAG. Scenario; There are 20 VMs running on servers connected to both switches, vSwitch with single LAG uplink on each server, static routes are created to anycast service IP on each VM, configured on switches to same /32 via 20 gateways, you want to use BFD to track next hop reach-ability...

Running a routing protocol with a neighbor connected via MLAG is also interesting. (peer routing)
